ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Submitted for Review' ), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Accepted'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Declined'),ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Signed' )),CONTAINS($Profile.Name ,'MDF Product Managers'), ISCHANGED(Product_Manager_Approval__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Program status may not be revised by Product Management as the marketing plan has already been sent to the partner for review.
